don't forget to handel large numbers in user input like 999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999
and like 0000000000000000000000000000009

parsing error need to fix ./push_swap 1 2 3 "- 4" 5 6 7

use ft_putstr_fd() instad of ft_printf()
